content:
Yes, there are beautiful islands to visit near Terengganu. Some of the most famous islands are:

1. Pulau Redang - known for its crystal-clear waters and white sandy beaches. The island is accessible by ferry from Kuala Terengganu.

2. Pulau Perhentian - famous for its coral reefs and marine life. The island can be reached by speedboat from Kuala Besut.

3. Pulau Lang Tengah - an idyllic island with beautiful beaches and reefs. The island can be reached by speedboat from Merang Jetty.

4. Pulau Kapas - known for its stunning beaches and laid-back atmosphere. The island can be reached by boat from Marang Jetty.

The best ways to get to these islands are by ferry or speedboat. Ferries and speedboats are available from Kuala Terengganu and Kuala Besut to reach these islands. Visitors can also hire private boats or take organized tours to these islands.
